name: docker-hosted
content:
import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager
import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy
def name='docker-hosted'
if(!repository.getRepositoryManager().exists(name)) { repository.createDockerHosted(name, null, null, BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME, false, false, WritePolicy.ALLOW_ONCE) }
